features.title: Magic Link Login

features.description: See who's online and who's offline in real-time. Easily identify when users are available for chat and stay connected

features.title: Room Management
features.description: Take control of your chat rooms. Add or remove members, update room details, and ensure a seamless chat experience tailored to your needs
